org.gvp.database

Interface IConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySqlConnection, SqlConnection

    public interface IConnection
    This package is used for create connection and contains classes as follows..

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        java.sql.Connection getConnection(java.lang.String Server_ip,
                                java.lang.String db_name,
                                java.lang.String user_name,
                                java.lang.String password)
        getConnection method returns the connection object of either mysql database or sql database.
        This method have 4 arguments and all are compulsory.
        1. Server Ip (e.g. Localhost,192.168.200.171){String}
        2. Database Name{String}
        3. User Name{String}
        4. Password{String}
        Returns:
        It returns Connection Object
